food_mode.hero: A senior Golden Retriever dog looking curiously at {food} on a wooden table. Warm natural lighting, cozy home kitchen background. Photorealistic, 8k resolution. -illustration -cartoon -anime
food_mode.detail: A close-up macro shot of fresh {food} on a wooden cutting board. A dog's golden paw is slightly visible at the edge of frame. Natural daylight, shallow depth of field. -illustration -cartoon
food_mode.reaction: A happy senior Golden Retriever with white muzzle tasting a small piece of {food}, tongue slightly visible, joyful expression. Indoor home setting, warm lighting. -illustration -cartoon
food_mode.info: A stainless steel dog food bowl next to a measured portion of {food} as a healthy treat. Clean white background, informative composition. -illustration -cartoon
food_mode.summary: A Golden Retriever and female owner enjoying snack time together in a warm, cozy living room. Dog sitting next to {food} on a plate. Natural window light. -illustration -cartoon
